column4: you know, never mind my problem, as much as i want this, ubuntu is running like a top for me for the most part. you guys have enough on your plate here. maybe ll give ya a ring tommorrow.
hey gmachine, i am not super knowledgeable so i may be way off on left field, but this sounds like a video driver issue..
